about_the_game:
Arsenal Access is a more advanced XENRO program. By enabling this module, whether in the main world or in the story mode, you will see an independently designed arsenal house.

[Titan Shield] can be enabled in the room, and 3 boxes of health packs with 450 HP recovery and 3 ammunition filling boxes can also be configured, and the following weapons can also be obtained at the same time:

1. XENRO Skirmish
2. Grenade Launcher
3. XENRO Sniper

There is also a Cyborg with level 3 HP and 2 defensive shield around the house.

Note: Purchasing this module will unlock Chapter 6 and all Chapters before it.
